ch.unifr.pai.twice.layout.client
Class DynamicLayout

java.lang.Object
  ch.unifr.pai.twice.layout.client.DynamicLayout
Direct Known Subclasses:
MobileLayout, SinglePointerLayout
public abstract class DynamicLayout
extends java.lang.Object

The dynamic layout component allows to define device specific layouts optimized for the different input modalities.

Author:
Oliver Schmid

getRootPanel
